attributes.action: Add Social Networking To The School Curriculum.
attributes.additional_details:
Social networking is the communication tool of the 21st century and becoming more and more important in the education of future generations.

Outside of educating future generations for social media and social networking we also need to explain the dangers and restrictions for young teens.

Raising the right kind of awareness can dramatically impact the way our future generations communicate and help educate them on the dangers out there too.

By signing this petition you are pledging your support for government to enforce social networking and social media as part of the UK national school curriculum.
